statements: SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role IN ('Developer', 'Designer') ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC, salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, position, salary FROM employees WHERE position = 'Developer' AND salary < 60000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT name, position, salary FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT e.name, s.date, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE e.position = 'Supervisor' AND s.date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT e.name, s.date, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.shift_start > '08:00:00' AND s.shift_end < '17:00:00';

SELECT e.name, e.position, s.date, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE e.salary > 60000 AND s.date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee WHERE employee_salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_salary FROM employee WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT pay_date, hours_worked, total_pay FROM payroll WHERE employee_id = 1234;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_salary FROM employee WHERE employee_salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, schedule_id, day_of_week, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee e JOIN schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY shift_start_time DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, p.pay_date, p.hours_worked, p.hourly_rate, p.total_pay FROM employee e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.pay_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY p.pay_date ASC;

SELECT employee_name, employee_role, pay_date, hours_worked, total_pay FROM employee e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE pay_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY ORDER BY employee_name DESC, pay_date ASC;

SELECT e.employee_name, s.schedule_id, s.day_of_week, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time, p.total_pay FROM employee e JOIN schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.total_pay > 1000 ORDER BY p.total_pay DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees JOIN payroll ON employees.employee_id = payroll.employee_id WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT position, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT schedule_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE employee_id=1001;
SELECT department_name, position_name, hourly_rate FROM departments JOIN positions ON departments.department_id = positions.position_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, position FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
